kizuna_head_b_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Ah, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. How
kind\r
of\r
you\r
to\r
stop by.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_02:
I must say, I am pleased to see you on school
grounds again.\c
Travel and adventure certainly have their place,
but it does one good to attend class as well, no?[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_03:
Speaking of which, there is something I would
very much like to ask you...[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_04:
I understand you have joined a variety of classes
during your time here at the academy.\c
But, if I may ask, which of our faculty members
has made the most favorable impression on you?[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_01:
Oho. Mr. Jacq from biology class, you say?\c
Yes, he is a fine teacher. A most earnest and
hardworking fellow.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_02:
Oho. Ms. Tyme from math class, you say?\c
Yes, she is a fine teacher. A most warm and
peaceable woman.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_03:
Oho. Ms. Raifort from history class, you say?\c
Yes, she is a fine teacher—extremely discerning
in her interests.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_04:
Oho. Mr. Salvatore from language class, you say?\c
Yes, he is a fine teacher. A most sociable and
outgoing fellow.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_05:
Oho. Ms. Dendra from battle class, you say?\c
Yes, she is a fine teacher. A most upbeat and
cheerful woman.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_06:
Oho. Mr. Hassel from art class, you say?\c
Yes, he is a fine teacher. A most passionate and
enthusiastic fellow.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_07:
Oho. Mr. Saguaro from home economics class,
you say?\c
Yes, he is a fine teacher. A most calm and
collected fellow.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_08:
Oho. Nurse Miriam, you say?\c
Yes, she is a fine practitioner of medicine. A most
kind and gentle soul.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_05_09:
M-me?! Are you quite sure?\c
I suspect some element of diplomacy may be at
work here, but if that is indeed how you feel...\r
then I am most happy to hear it.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_06a:
We are truly blessed to have so many wonderful
teachers and staff members at Naranja Academy.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_06b:
We are truly blessed to have so many wonderful
teachers and staff members at Uva Academy.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_07:
I firmly believe that our faculty is second to none
in their commitment to our students’ ongoing\r
education and well-being.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_08:
Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_b_system_01: You became even closer with Director Clavell!
